item.title: Blog Deployment Process Vol.2
item.description: From Vol.1, this article is explaining for Hugo x GitHub Pages x Travis CI.

item.title: Blog Deployment Process Vol.1
item.description:
Hello Everyone.

Today, I’d like to talk about my blog deployment process. It is the first time that I create webblogs and so I don’t know any knowledge(Actually, I needed 2 days to deploy this blog), I’m sorry that having mistakes, and Your comments are welcomed.
